tool_description: The color of the reference picture can be transferred to the original image, and the color transfer of high-definition images can be supported, which can ensure that the color of the portrait part does not change.
name: HD Colour migration
title: HD Colour migration

api_list.name: Retrieve Task Results by request_id

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description:
Asynchronous task type.
- `HD_COLOUR_MIGRATION`: HD color migration.

data.description: The content of the result data returned.

enum.TIMEOUT_FAILED: The task timeout did not complete.
enum.LIMIT_RETRY_FAILED: Exceeded maximum number of retries for processing failures.

image_list.description: The real request result returned by HD color migration asynchronous task. Note: The URL address is a temporary address, valid for 24 hours, and will not be accessible after the expiration date.

api_list.name: Retrieve Task Results by task_id
api_list.description: Retrieve asynchronous task results by `task_id`. An API more efficient than 'Retrieve Task Results by `request_id`'.

data.description: The content of the result data returned.

enum.TIMEOUT_FAILED: The task timeout did not complete.
enum.LIMIT_RETRY_FAILED: Exceeded maximum number of retries for processing failures.

image_list.description: The real request result returned by HD color migration asynchronous task. Note: The URL address is a temporary address, valid for 24 hours, and will not be accessible after the expiration date.
